languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Не моргнул{mf||а} и глазом, когда это отребье ворвалось на палубу, м? Неплохо. Я видела многих офицеров, впадающих в панику при виде боев на верхних палубах — ощущение ложной безопасности делает их чувствительными к жестоким реалиям {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-переходов". {n}Теодора опускает взгляд на {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}, который держит в руке. До вас доносится звук безжизненной статики.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Не моргнул{mf||а} и глазом, когда это отребье ворвалось на палубу, м? Неплохо. Я видела многих офицеров, впадающих в панику при виде боев на верхних палубах — ощущение ложной безопасности делает их чувствительными к жестоким реалиям {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-переходов". {n}Теодора опускает взгляд на {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}, который держит в руке. До вас доносится звук безжизненной статики.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} turns her eyes to you.{/n} "Didn't bat an eye when that scum burst onto the deck, hmm? Not bad. I have seen many an officer who panicked at the sight of combat on the upper decks — the false sense of security offered by their position makes them that much more vulnerable to the harsh realities of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} travel." {n}She looks at the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} in her hand. All you can hear is lifeless static.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Не моргнул{mf||а} и глазом, когда это отребье ворвалось на палубу, м? Неплохо. I have seen many an officer who panicked at the sight of combat on the upper decks — the false sense of security makes them that much more sensitive to the harsh realities of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} transitions." {n}She looks at the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} in her hand. All you can hear is lifeless static.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}将目光转向了你。{/n}“那头畜生冲到甲板上的时候，你甚至连眼睛都没眨，嗯？还不错嘛。我见过很多军官，他们一看到上层甲板发生战斗，就会吓得慌里慌张。那群人高高在上，活在虚假的安全感之中，他们更容易受到{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}湍流的影响。”{n}她看着手中的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵装置{/g}，你只听到里面传来毫无生气的静电声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} turns her eyes to you.{/n} "Didn't bat an eye when that scum burst onto the deck, hmm? Not bad. I have seen many an officer who panicked at the sight of combat on the upper decks — the false sense of security offered by their position makes them that much more vulnerable to the harsh realities of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} travel." {n}She looks at the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} in her hand. All you can hear is lifeless static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}将目光转向了你。{/n}“那头畜生冲到甲板上的时候，你甚至连眼睛都没眨，嗯？还不错嘛。我见过很多军官，他们一看到上层甲板发生战斗，就会吓得慌里慌张。那群人活在虚假的安全感之中，他们更容易受到{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}残酷景象的影响。”{n}她看着手中的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵装置{/g}，你只听到里面传来毫无生气的静电声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} posa su mirada sobre ti.{/n} «No pestañeaste siquiera cuando esa escoria se coló en la cubierta, ¿mmm? No está mal. He visto a muchos oficiales entrar en pánico ante la noción del combate en las cubiertas superiores, y la falsa sensación de seguridad que ofrece su posición los hace mucho más vulnerables a la terrible realidad del viaje por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}». {n}Mira el {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} que lleva en la mano. No oyes más que estática inerte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} turns her eyes to you.{/n} "Didn't bat an eye when that scum burst onto the deck, hmm? Not bad. I have seen many an officer who panicked at the sight of combat on the upper decks — the false sense of security offered by their position makes them that much more vulnerable to the harsh realities of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} travel." {n}She looks at the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} in her hand. All you can hear is lifeless static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} posa su mirada sobre ti.{/n} «No pestañeaste siquiera cuando esa escoria se coló en la cubierta, ¿mmm? No está mal. He visto a muchos oficiales entrar en pánico ante la noción del combate en las cubiertas superiores, y esa falsa sensación de seguridad los hace mucho más vulnerables a la terrible realidad de las transiciones a la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}». {n}Mira el {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} que lleva en la mano. No oyes más que estática inerte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}はあなたに目をやる。{/n}「デッキに襲撃があったときに、あなたは瞬きすらしなかったとは感心だ。私は上層デッキで戦闘を見てパニックになった士官を何人も見てきた…その立場がもたらす誤った安心感で、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}移行の厳しい現実にもっと影響されやすくなる」{n}彼女は手に持った{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}を見つめる。聞こえるのは生気のない雑音だけだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} turns her eyes to you.{/n} "Didn't bat an eye when that scum burst onto the deck, hmm? Not bad. I have seen many an officer who panicked at the sight of combat on the upper decks — the false sense of security offered by their position makes them that much more vulnerable to the harsh realities of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} travel." {n}She looks at the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} in her hand. All you can hear is lifeless static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}はあなたに目をやる。{/n}デッキに飛び出してきたとき、瞬きしなかった？悪くない。上デッキで戦闘を見てパニックになった士官を何人も見てきた…誤った安心感で、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}移行の厳しい現実にもっと影響されやすくなる」 {n}彼女は手に持った{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}を見つめる。聞こえるのは生気のない雑音だけだ。{/n}

{n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}はあなたに目をやる。{/n}「デッキに襲撃があったときに、あなたは瞬きすらしなかったとは感心だ。私は上層デッキで戦闘を見てパニックになった士官を何人も見てきた…その立場がもたらす誤った安心感で、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}移行の厳しい現実にもっと影響されやすくなる」{n}彼女は手に持った{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}を見つめる。聞こえるのは生気のない雑音だけだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Vous n'avez même pas cillé en voyant cette vermine faire irruption sur le pont, hein ? Bravo. J'ai vu beaucoup trop d'officiers pris de panique à la vue d'un combat sur les ponts supérieurs ; cette fausse impression de sécurité liée à leur statut les rend d'autant plus vulnérables aux dures réalités de la traversée du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. » {n}Elle observe le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} dans sa main. Vous n'entendez que des parasites sans vie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} turns her eyes to you.{/n} "Didn't bat an eye when that scum burst onto the deck, hmm? Not bad. I have seen many an officer who panicked at the sight of combat on the upper decks — the false sense of security offered by their position makes them that much more vulnerable to the harsh realities of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} travel." {n}She looks at the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} in her hand. All you can hear is lifeless static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g} se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Vous n'avez même pas cillé en voyant cette vermine faire irruption sur le pont, hein ? Bravo. J'ai vu beaucoup trop d'officiers pris de panique à la vue d'un combat sur les ponts supérieurs ; cette fausse impression de sécurité les rend d'autant plus sensibles aux dures réalités des transitions dans le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. » {n}Elle observe le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} dans sa main. Vous n'entendez que des parasites sans vie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} wendet ihren Blick dir zu.{/n} "Nicht mit der Wimper gezuckt, als der Abschaum aufs Deck gestürmt kam, hmm? Nicht schlecht. Ich habe schon viele Offiziere gesehen, die angesichts eines Kampfs auf den oberen Decks in Panik geraten sind – das falsche Gefühl von Sicherheit, das mit ihrer Position verbunden ist, macht sie anfälliger für die harte Realität der {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Transitionen." {n}Sie blickt auf das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} in ihrer Hand. Du hörst nichts als lebloses Rauschen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} turns her eyes to you.{/n} "Didn't bat an eye when that scum burst onto the deck, hmm? Not bad. I have seen many an officer who panicked at the sight of combat on the upper decks — the false sense of security offered by their position makes them that much more vulnerable to the harsh realities of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} travel." {n}She looks at the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} in her hand. All you can hear is lifeless static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} wendet ihren Blick dir zu.{/n} "Nicht mit der Wimper gezuckt, als der Abschaum aufs Deck gestürmt kam, hmm? Nicht schlecht. Ich habe schon viele Offiziere gesehen, die angesichts eines Kampfs auf den oberen Decks in Panik geraten sind – das falsche Sicherheitsgefühl macht sie viel empfindlicher für die harte Realität der {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Transitionen." {n}Sie blickt auf das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} in ihrer Hand. Zu hören ist nichts als lebloses Rauschen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} gözlerini sana çeviriyor.{/n} "O şerefsizler güverteye dalınca gözünü bile kırpmadın. Aferin. Üst güvertede arbede çıkınca paçaları tutuşan çok subay gördü bu gözler. Konumlarının getirdiği emniyet illüzyonuna kapılıp gardlarını indirirler, {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} yolculuğunun acı gerçekliği de suratlarına tokat gibi çarpar." {n}Kadın, elindeki {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksa{/g} bakıyor. Tek duyabildiğin cansız bir cızırtı oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} turns her eyes to you.{/n} "Didn't bat an eye when that scum burst onto the deck, hmm? Not bad. I have seen many an officer who panicked at the sight of combat on the upper decks — the false sense of security offered by their position makes them that much more vulnerable to the harsh realities of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} travel." {n}She looks at the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} in her hand. All you can hear is lifeless static.{/n}

Tek duyabildiğin cansız bir cızırtı oluyor.{/n}
